member.name: P:Program.Earthquake.output
member.summary: Run the analysis for given input

member.name: P:Program.Earthquake.critDT
member.summary: Maximum recomanded time step. Formula taken from Hughes's book for linear 1d rod element with full mass matrix.

member.name: P:Program.Earthquake.input
member.summary: Return output record

member.name: M:Program.Earthquake.solve(Program.Types.input)
member.summary: Save displacement fields in each timestep in Main analysis driver

member.name: M:Program.Earthquake.interpolate(System.Double,Microsoft.FSharp.Collections.FSharpList{System.Double},System.Double)
member.summary: Takes time series with constant time step DT and generates time series with finner step dt.

member.name: M:Program.Earthquake.localize(Microsoft.FSharp.Collections.FSharpList{Program.Types.element},Microsoft.FSharp.Core.FSharpFunc{Program.Types.element,MathNet.Numerics.LinearAlgebra.Double.DenseMatrix})
member.summary: Localizes element matrices to global matrix. Mapping selects the matrices which are to be localized, i.e. stiffness or mass matrix.

member.name: M:Program.Earthquake.getNumDOF(Microsoft.FSharp.Collections.FSharpList{Program.Types.element})
member.summary: Returns the number of DOFs as the highest code number plus one.

member.name: M:Program.Earthquake.getM(Program.Types.element)
member.summary: Returns mass matrix of given element

member.name: M:Program.Earthquake.getK(Program.Types.element)
member.summary: Returns stiffness matrix of given element
